Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: A simple $(this.trait:color) shot glass centrally embossed with $(this.trait:variation). Above the embossment, in arched calligraphy, the word 'Hallowtide' has been neatly etched. It contains within it a vampire kiss cocktail.
A simple $(this.trait:color) Hallowtide shot glass centrally embossed with $(this.trait:variation). It contains within it a vampire kiss cocktail.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: "The strong flavoring of vodka automatically overwhelms your senses, gradually fading into the refreshing and bubbly taste of champagne. After swallowing, a possibly familiar metallic taste lingers thickly in the back of your throat"

X[M] \$this."trait:color" = oneof( "ruby red", "blood red", "dark red", "lipstick red", "sangria red", "scarlet", "crimson" ); \$this."trait:variation" = oneof( "reverse arrows", "a severed head", "spooky pumpkins", "a witch's broom", "a grinning skull", "a full moon", "a tombstone" ); return TRUE;
